email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear James,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a shipment of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai.

Commodity: Coal
Quantity: 50,000 MT
Load Port: Newcastle
Discharge Port: Shanghai
Incoterms: FOB
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 25/MT
Laycan: 01-05 Dec 2023

Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Maria Santos
Blue Ocean Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
James Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

The MV OCEAN BREEZE has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata.

Regarding the rate, we believe it is competitive given the current market conditions. However, we are open to discussions.

Best regards,
Maria Santos
Blue Ocean Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Maria,

Thank you for the additional details. We are considering a slightly larger cargo size of 55,000 MT. Could you provide a revised freight quote considering this increase?

Best regards,
James Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Considering the additional cargo, we can offer a revised freight quote of USD 23.50/MT. This rate takes into account the economies of scale with the increased cargo size.

Best regards,
Maria Santos
Blue Ocean Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Maria,

The revised rate looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment. Please confirm the laycan and stem details.

Best regards,
James Wilson
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Coal - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Great to hear that! We will confirm the laycan as 01-05 Dec 2023. We will also ensure that the stem is ready by then.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Maria Santos
Blue Ocean Brokers
